    Reference

    DEIMS-SDR interaction functions

    Sites

    For retrive information about LTER sites stored in DEIMS-SDR website

    get_site_info()

    eLTER get_site_info function

    get_site_ODS()

    eLTER get_site_ODS function

    Networks

    For retrive information about LTER networks stored in DEIMS-SDR website

    get_network_envcharacts()

    eLTER get_network_envcharacts function

    get_network_parameters()

    eLTER get_network_parameters function

    get_network_research_topics()

    eLTER get_network_research_topics function

    get_network_related_resources()

    eLTER get_network_related_resources function

    get_network_sites()

    eLTER get_network_sites function

    All ILTER

    For retrive information about all ILTER network stored in DEIMS-SDR website

    get_ilter_envcharacts()

    eLTER get_ilter_envcharacts function

    get_ilter_generalinfo()

    eLTER get_ilter_generalinfo function

    get_ilter_parameters()

    eLTER get_ilter_parameters function

    get_ilter_research_topics()

    eLTER get_ilter_research_topics function

    Other entities

    For retrive information about other entities (datasets and activites) stored in DEIMS-SDR website

    get_activity_info()

    eLTER get_activity_info function

    get_dataset_info()

    eLTER get_dataset_info function
